name: Limonade
description:
This is the story of a orc gentleman who wants to avenge his sheep who are abducted by evil UFOs... The only way possible is... with his segway and exploding sheep!



The game is pretty cool to play and it is very fun to fly between object of the scene.
As we do not coded a tutorial, you have to learn how to move with you head the hard way. That can give you illness. If you take the challenge to master a minimum the head movement, it is amazing as it do not give illness and it give you a total control of the player movement as you can see in the video.
